system_prompt:
IMPORTANT: 请用中文回答所有文本字段。All text output must be in Chinese.

## YOUR ROLE
You are a Senior Procurement Consultant for Yilong Business Limited, a high-volume IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) trading firm.
Your goal is to evaluate potential US-based vendors to see if they fit our supply chain requirements.

## CONTEXT - WHO WE ARE (THE BUYER)
- Company: Yilong Business Limited (Hong Kong-based with US operations)
- Business Model: We purchase used IT assets in bulk (Ex Works - EXW) from US facilities and export them to established downstream markets in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Southeast Asia
- Volume: We have a purchasing budget of ~$1.5M per month ($10M–$20M annually)
- Compliance: We operate a strict "High-Quality Refurbishment" model. We do NOT export e-waste. We require assets to be "Tested Functional" (R2v3 F2/C3 or better)

## YOUR TASK
You are analyzing a company website. The provided content belongs to ONE SINGLE company.
All URLs are under the same root domain.
The content contains text from multiple pages, separated by "# URL: ".

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. The crawl covers multiple pages (Home, About, Contact, etc.).
2. There is significant overlapping/duplicate information across these pages.
3. You MUST consolidate all information into a SINGLE company profile.
4. Do NOT output a list of companies. Extract exactly ONE company object.
5. Ignore minor differences in descriptions across pages; synthesize them into a comprehensive summary.

## INFORMATION TO EXTRACT

1. **Company Information:**
   - Company name
   - Main website URL (the root domain, e.g., https://example.com)
   - Main business/industry
   - Brief description of what they do

2. **Products/Services:**
   - List all products or services offered
   - Key capabilities or specializations

3. **Contact Information:**
   - ALL email addresses found (support, sales, info, contact, etc.)
   - Phone numbers
   - Physical address/location
   - Contact page URLs

4. **Additional Details:**
   - Company size (if mentioned)
   - Year founded (if mentioned)
   - Certifications or awards (especially R2v3, e-Stewards)
   - Geographic coverage/service areas

## VENDOR QUALIFICATION CRITERIA

Evaluate if this company is a good fit for Yilong based on these 2 pillars:

### PILLAR 1: INVENTORY FIT
**Must Have:**
- Enterprise IT assets: Laptops, Desktops, Data Center Servers, Networking Equipment, Storage

**Bonus Points:**
- Harvested components (high-value CPU, RAM, SSD/HDD)

**Condition Requirements:**
- Grade A/B (Ready for Retail) - Preferred
- Tested Functional Grade C (Ready for Refurbishment) - Acceptable

**RED FLAGS:**
- Only handles residential recycling (curbside pickup)
- Focuses primarily on shredding/scrap metal
- No mention of testing or grading
- Only handles consumer electronics (phones, tablets, TVs)

### PILLAR 2: OPERATIONAL FIT
**Business Type:**
- Must be an ITAD Processor or Asset Recovery Firm (B2B focus)
- NOT a retail reseller or consumer-focused recycler

**Certification:**
- R2v3 certification is highly preferred (indicates they can test/wipe data correctly)
- e-Stewards is also acceptable

**Sales Channel:**
- Must support Wholesale / Bulk sales (Pallet/Truckload quantities)
- If they only sell single units on eBay/Amazon to consumers, they are a BAD fit

**RED FLAGS:**
- Only residential/consumer services
- No B2B capabilities mentioned
- No certifications
- Only retail sales channels

## EVALUATION OUTPUT
Based on the above criteria, provide:
- is_good_fit: true/false - Is this company worth reaching out to?
- inventory_fit_assessment: Detailed explanation of how they match our inventory needs
- operational_fit_assessment: Detailed explanation of their operational capabilities
- red_flags: List of any concerns or disqualifying factors
- recommendation: "Reach out", "Skip", or "Research further"
- reasoning: Clear explanation of why you recommend reaching out or skipping

Be thorough and extract ALL contact emails you can find.
If information is not available, use null for that field.

website_url.description: Main website URL of the company (the root domain, e.g., https://example.com)
website_url.title: Website Url

description.description: Brief description of what the company does
description.title: Description

products_services.description: List of products or services offered
products_services.title: Products Services

contact_emails.description: All email addresses found on the website
contact_emails.title: Contact Emails

summary.description: A 2-3 paragraph human-readable summary of the company
summary.title: Summary

is_good_fit.description: Overall assessment - Is this company worth reaching out to for Yilong's procurement needs?
is_good_fit.title: Is Good Fit

inventory_fit_assessment.description: Detailed explanation of how the company's inventory (product types, grades, volumes) matches Yilong's requirements for enterprise IT assets
inventory_fit_assessment.title: Inventory Fit Assessment

operational_fit_assessment.description: Detailed explanation of the company's operational capabilities (B2B focus, certifications, wholesale channels) and fit with Yilong's bulk purchasing model
operational_fit_assessment.title: Operational Fit Assessment

red_flags.description: List of any concerns or disqualifying factors (e.g., residential-only, no certifications, retail-only sales, scrap metal focus)
red_flags.title: Red Flags

reasoning.description: Clear explanation of why you recommend reaching out or skipping this vendor, based on the evaluation criteria
reasoning.title: Reasoning

# URL: https://www.trinityitrecycling.com
 Schedule A Pickup
## Who We Are..............!!!!
**Trinity IT Recycling** is an **R2v3 and ISO-certified** electronics recycling company proudly serving the **Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex and beyond**. We provide secure, sustainable, and fully compliant solutions for managing retired IT assets, helping organizations reduce e-waste while ensuring data security and environmental responsibility.
Our core services include **secure data destruction** , **e-waste recycling** , **IT asset disposition (ITAD)** , **IT asset buyback** , **data center decommissioning** , and **hard drive shredding** —available both on-site and off-site. We also offer **free pickup services for businesses** , making the process efficient and hassle-free.
Trinity IT Recycling serves a wide range of industries, including **hospitals** , **government agencies** , **businesses of all sizes** , **schools** , **data centers** , **IT leasing companies** , **retailers** , **banks** , **distributors** , and **bio-tech companies**. Whether you’re a small office or a large enterprise, we tailor our services to meet your unique needs while ensuring the highest standards of compliance and security.
With a strong commitment to environmental stewardship and data protection, Trinity IT Recycling is your trusted partner for responsible IT asset management. Contact us today to learn more or to schedule a free business pickup.

# URL: https://trinityitrecycling.com/certification
**Certification**
### R2V3 (Responsible Recycling)
Trinity IT Recycling is an R2v3-certified company, which means we meet the internationally recognized standard for responsible e-waste recycling and refurbishment.
Achieving this certification required us to demonstrate full compliance with all standards set by the certification body, including responsible electronics recycling, data security, worker health and safety, environmental protection, as well as core and process-specific requirements.
Our systems and practices were thoroughly audited by an independent third-party auditor, and our efforts were then reviewed and approved by Sustainable Electronics Recycling International (SERI)—the organization that oversees the R2v3 standard.
## ISO 9001:2015
  * Trinity IT Recycling is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company, the current version of the internationally recognized standard for Quality Management Systems (QMS).
This certification provides a structured framework that enables organizations like ours to consistently deliver products and services that meet both customer expectations and regulatory requirements. It reflects our ongoing commitment to quality, continuous improvement, and customer satisfaction.
### ISO 14001:2015
Trinity IT Recycling is an ISO 14001:2015 certified company, meeting the internationally recognized standard for Environmental Management Systems (EMS). This certification provides a structured framework that allows us to establish, implement, maintain, and continually improve our environmental practices.
By following this standard, we are able to effectively manage our environmental responsibilities, reduce our environmental impact, and ensure compliance with all relevant legal and regulatory requirements. ISO 14001:2015 helps us identify and control environmental risks in our operations, supporting our commitment to sustainability and responsible recycling.
## ISO 45001:2018
  * Trinity IT Recycling is an ISO 45001:2018 certified company, adhering to the international standard for Occupational Health and Safety (OH&S) management systems.
This certification provides a framework for identifying and managing workplace risks, improving safety performance, and promoting a healthier work environment. It reflects our commitment to reducing work-related injuries, illnesses, and ensuring the well-being of our employees.

# Data Center Decommissioning Services
### Our Data Center Decommissioning Services Include:
At **Trinity IT Recycling** , we specialize in providing **efficient, secure, and hassle-free data center decommissioning services** for businesses of all sizes. Whether you’re consolidating, relocating, upgrading, or closing down a facility, our expert team ensures a seamless process from start to finish.
We understand the complexity and sensitivity involved in decommissioning mission-critical IT infrastructure. That’s why we offer a **turnkey solution** designed to minimize downtime, protect data, and maximize the value of your retired assets.
  * **On-site evaluation and planning**
  * **Safe removal of all IT equipment** (servers, switches, racks, cabling, etc.)
  * **Secure data destruction** (NIST 800-88 data wiping or NSA/CSS-approved physical destruction)
  * **Asset inventory and detailed reporting**
  * **IT asset buyback for remarket able equipment**
  * **Environmentally responsible recycling for end-of-life gear**
  * **Logistics and transportation** with full chain-of-custody tracking
  * **Certificates of Data Destruction and Recycling**
We handle every step with professionalism, discretion, and full compliance with **industry regulations** , including **HIPAA** where applicable.
Our goal is to provide you with **peace of mind** , knowing that your data is secure, your equipment is responsibly managed, and your project stays on time and on budget
## Our Solutions
###### We offer companies and organizations extensive recycling solutions, industry-specific waste management, quality control & sustainability solutions.
### Environmental
We help you achieve disposal of your E-waste without causing any damage to the environment.
###  E-Waste Picking
We arrange a pick-up for your IT E-waste and help you dispose it responsibly.
### Recycling Services
We collect your e-waste in a more hassle-free way and provide best in class solutions

# URL: https://trinityitrecycling.com/data-destruction
# Data Destruction
##### Method one: Data Sanitization through industry standard software and method.
As an R2v3 and ISO-certified recycler, Trinity IT Recycling adheres to the highest industry standards for secure and responsible electronics recycling. We follow the NIST 800-88 standard for data sanitization, ensuring that all sensitive information is thoroughly and permanently wiped from your devices. Our commitment to excellence means you’ll receive detailed certificates and reports for every service we provide, giving you the security, compliance, and peace of mind you need. Whether you’re disposing of outdated equipment or managing a full-scale IT asset retirement, we’re here to help you do it responsibly, securely, and in full compliance with environmental and data protection regulations. Let us partner with you in creating a cleaner, safer, and more sustainable future through responsible e-waste management.
##### Method Two: Physical HDD Destruction using NSA/CSS approved products.
At **Trinity IT Recycling** , we take data security seriously. In addition to industry-standard data wiping procedures, we offer **physical data destruction** using **NSA/CSS-approved equipment** to ensure the complete and irreversible destruction of data-bearing devices.
We utilize the a high-security, NSA/CSS-listed device specifically designed to physically crush and destroy hard drives beyond recovery. This machine applies **40,000 pounds of crushing force** , rendering drives completely inoperable and data unrecoverable—meeting and exceeding government standards for physical data destruction.
This process is ideal for:
  * **Sensitive or classified data**
  * **Damaged or non-functioning drives**
  * **Clients requiring physical verification of destruction**
  * **Organizations bound by strict data compliance laws (HIPAA, GLBA, etc.)**
Upon request, we provide **Certificates of Physical Destruction** along with optional photo or video documentation for added transparency and audit support.
With Trinity IT Recycling, your data doesn’t just disappear—it is **destroyed with verified precision** using the highest level of approved technology.

# URL: https://trinityitrecycling.com/e-waste-recyling
# E-waste Recycling
### Ensuring E-waste Recycling are done as per the Regulations
## What is E-waste ?
As per E-Waste (Management) Rules, 2016.
‘E-waste’ means electrical and electronic equipment, whole or in part discarded as waste by the consumer or bulk consumer as well as rejects from manufacturing, refurbishment and repair processes.
E-waste is a popular, informal name for electronic products nearing the end of their “useful life.” Computers, televisions, VCR’s, stereos, copiers, and fax machines are common electronic products. Many of these products can be reused, refurbished, or recycled.
## E-waste Recycling
Once these materials were found, There was a need to test each E-waste component to see how long they lasted. As per the Study, the components lasted much longer than expected. Then It was concluded that this is a serious issue to the Environment and it has to be fixed in a proper way.
While this procedure is underway, There was a need to do more than throwing the things away. There exists the Recycling process and methods.
## Offering secure Recycling services for
## E-waste & Old IT Assets
#####  Keep your Data Secure, Protect Yourself with the right choice for handling E-waste
## Importance of E-waste Recycling
There is a paramount importance for the E-waste recycling systems in today’s situation. These systems were designed to get all the valuable electronic components out of our landfills.
One of the major issues we are faced with today is finding a way to provide the highest quality of life for all of our next Generations. This is why there was a need for Testing, which developed an option for examining every material that is produced today.
### Key Indications need to be followed prior Recycling Process
* Before starting the process of recycling, the electronics need to be classified according to their use. This helps in making the process of sorting easier.
* One should need to find out what materials these electronics are made of, What type of metals are used for the manufacture of the product.
* When one takes electronic products for . If they are not, it’s essential to file them away. Make sure One does this to avoid the possibility of them getting lost.
#### E-waste Recycling Process
E-waste is nothing but the waste products that come from electrical equipment that is bought and reused, and the process used for its recycling is called E-waste recycling.
Electronic Products are one among the most available options when compared to other forms of waste. However, it’s important to remember that not all electronic products have to be recycled. Different types of products need specific programs & processes to be accepted as recyclable.
There are various sources which provide the raw materials, where these devices are assembled and then operated or maintained.
# Schedule Pickup
# URL: https://trinityitrecycling.com/free-business-pickup
# Free Business Pickup
## Free Business Pickup:
At **Trinity IT Recycling** , we make IT asset disposal easy and convenient for our business clients by offering **free pickup services** under qualifying conditions.
We provide **free local pickup within a 20-mile radius** of our facility for businesses with a **minimum of one pallet of equipment** or **at least 50 qualifying items**.
For larger quantities, we proudly extend our **free pickup service throughout the DFW metroplex—and even beyond** , depending on the volume and type of materials scheduled for collection.
**Need help determining if your pickup qualifies?**
Contact us today with your inventory details, and we’ll be happy to assess eligibility and schedule your free pickup.
Our logistics team will coordinate directly with your staff to ensure a smooth and timely pickup. All equipment is handled securely and in accordance with **environmental and data security standards**.
## Items Associated with Recycling Fees.
Although **most items are accepted free of charge** , certain electronics require a **small disposal fee** to cover the cost of responsible recycling through our certified downstream vendors and manufacturers. These fees help ensure that we continue to meet strict environmental and safety standards. **Items with associated recycling fees include:**
  * **Televisions** – $20 each
  * **Printers or fax machines** (more than one) – $5 each
  * **PDUs (Power Distribution Units)** – $10 each
  * **Batteries** – $10 each
  * **NO CRT TVS AND NO CRT MONITORS**
We strive to keep these fees as low as possible while ensuring all materials are handled responsibly and in compliance with regulatory guidelines. For any questions about specific items or pricing, please contact our team—we’re happy to help.
# Schedule Pickup
# URL: https://trinityitrecycling.com/it-asset-buys-back
# IT Asset Buy Back!
## WHAT WE BUY BACK
At **Trinity IT Recycling** , we understand that IT equipment represents a significant investment for any organization. That’s why we offer a dedicated **IT Asset Buyback Program** —designed to help our valued clients **recover value** from their retired or surplus technology.
Our buyback program allows businesses to **recoup a portion of their original investment** by selling back eligible IT assets. This not only supports responsible e-waste practices but also provides a **return on investment (ROI)** that can be reinvested into future technological upgrades or initiatives.
##  We offer competitive market value assessments for a wide range of equipment, including:
  * Laptops and desktops
  * Servers and networking gear
  * Storage devices and peripherals
  * Mobile devices
  * Office electronics in good working condition
Our Process Is Simple, Secure, And Transparent:
## 1. Assessment
  1. We evaluate your equipment based on make, model, condition, and market value.
## 2. Quote
  1. You receive a fair, no-obligation buyback offers.
## 3.Data Security
All data is securely wiped or physically destroyed in compliance with NIST and NSA/CSS standards.
## 4. Payment
Once approved, payment is issued promptly, and a detailed asset report is provided for your records.
## Whether you’re upgrading infrastructure, downsizing, or liquidating assets, Trinity IT Recycling helps you turn outdated equipment into valuable capital. Contact us today to find out how much your retired IT equipment could be worth.

# URL: https://trinityitrecycling.com/who-we-serve
# Who We Serve
## Our Clients
### Hospital​
As an **R2v3 and ISO-certified** electronics recycler, **Trinity IT Recycling** is proud to partner with **hospitals, clinics, and healthcare organizations** to provide **secure, compliant, and environmentally responsible** solutions for retiring IT assets.
We understand the unique challenges the healthcare industry faces when disposing of electronic equipment that may contain **sensitive patient data** and **regulated medical information**. Our services are designed to meet and exceed the stringent requirements of **HIPAA** , **HITECH** , and other data privacy laws governing the healthcare sector.
**Our Healthcare IT Recycling Services Include:**
**Secure data destruction** using NIST 800-88 and NSA/CSS-approved methods
**Chain-of-custody documentation and Certificates of Data Destruction**
**Recycling of a wide range of equipment** , including computers, servers, medical monitors, imaging devices, and more
**Convenience** : Free pickup and end-to-end handling reduce administrative burden for busy IT and compliance teams.
Our experienced team works closely with your IT and compliance departments to ensure all assets are processed safely and securely, without disrupting your operations
### Government Agencies
As an R2v3 and ISO-certified company, Trinity IT Recycling offers government and state agencies a comprehensive, secure, and environmentally responsible solution for retiring IT assets.
**Robust Data Destruction (FISMA & NIST Aligned):** Trinity implements secure data sanitization—including wiping, shredding, and on-site destruction—that meets federal standards like NIST SP 800-88 and supports FISMA requirements, safeguarding sensitive national and citizen data.
**Comprehensive Audit Trail:** Every retired IT asset is tagged, tracked, and processed with a fully documented chain-of-custody and Certificates of Destruction, ensuring accountability and audit readiness for legal oversight.
**Operational Efficiency with Free Pickup:** Offering end-to-end logistics—from secure pickup to final certification—Trinity frees up IT staff to focus on core missions and supports budget-conscious planning through predictable, centralized IT asset disposition.
In short, Trinity IT Recycling supports public-sector mandates by delivering secure, transparent, compliant, and sustainable disposal of IT assets—exactly what state and federal agencies require
### Businesses
Businesses and corporations benefit from Trinity IT Recycling’s secure, compliant, and efficient IT asset disposition services. Trinity employs certified data destruction methods—including secure wiping, degaussing, and physical shredding—to permanently erase sensitive information, ensuring protection against data breaches and compliance with regulations like GDPR, HIPAA, and SOX. They provide comprehensive documentation, including Certificates of Destruction and chain-of-custody records, facilitating audit readiness and legal compliance. Additionally, Trinity responsibly recycles a wide range of electronics, preventing hazardous materials from entering landfills and supporting sustainability goals. With free business pickup and end-to-end handling, Trinity reduces logistical burdens, allowing businesses to focus on core operations while ensuring secure and environmentally responsible disposal of IT assets.

### Hospital​
As an R2v3 and ISO-certified company, Trinity IT Recycling offers government and state agencies a comprehensive, secure, and environmentally responsible solution for retiring IT assets.
### Goverment
